requirements.question: Watch an anime with the format “TV” and exactly 24 episodes
Watch an anime with the format “TV” and 50 or more episodes
Watch an anime that finished airing in 1999 or earlier
Watch an anime that started and finished airing in different years
Watch an anime that started airing in a year with the same last two digits
Watch an anime with the format “Movie” that was released in the past 3 years
Watch an anime where the last number of its mean score is the same as the last number of the year it began airing
Watch an anime from the release year you have watched the fewest titles
Watch an anime with the format “TV” that has less than 10 episodes or 14 to 20 episodes
Watch an anime that started airing after you entered the Advanced Challenge
Watch an anime that has 5 genres or more
Watch an anime that combines your top 2 genres based on time watched
Watch an anime that has at least 2 tags from the same category
Watch an anime with a tag or genre that begins with the first letter of your username
Watch an anime that has your highest rated demographic tag based on mean score
Watch an anime with the tag “Isekai” or “Idol”
Watch an anime with the tag “Cute Girls Doing Cute Things” or “Gore”
Watch an anime with the tag “School” or “Super Power”
Watch an anime with the tag “Harem” or “Historical”
Watch an anime with the tag “Magic” or “Military”
Watch an anime with 2 or more of the 10 tags above
Watch an anime that does not have any of the 10 tags above
Watch an anime that does not have any of your 5 most watched genres based on count
Watch an anime with a tag that does not appear in your top 30 tags or your least watched tag based on count
Watch an anime with at least 2 of your 3 least liked genres based on mean score
Watch an anime with the source “Original” and the format “TV”
Watch an anime with the source “Manga” that does not have the format “TV”
Watch an anime with the source “Novel”
Watch an anime with the format “Special”, “OVA” or “ONA” that is related to an anime you watched in any AWC Tier Challenge
Watch an anime that has a prequel and a sequel
Watch an anime by a Studio or Producer that starts with the first letter of your username
Watch an anime by one of your top 5 Studios based on count
Watch an anime with a Staff member whose profile image is a drawing instead of a photograph
Watch an anime with one of your favourite male Staff members
Watch an anime with one of your favourite female Staff members
Watch an anime that features a male main character and a female main character
Watch an anime with a female character that uses a gun or a sword
Watch an anime with a topless male character
Watch an anime with a fluffy, furry or scaly character
Watch an anime with a character that uses a flip phone
Watch an anime that features an adult, a teenager and a kid
Watch an anime with a character that has a physical disability or sensory impairment
Watch an anime with a main character that wears headgear
Watch an anime that features an animal familiar or companion creature
Watch an anime with a main character that is a villain or anti-hero
Watch an anime that is set 100 or more years in the past or 100 or more years in the future
Watch an anime that takes place in a fantasy setting
Watch an anime with cover art that only features one character
Watch an anime with cover art that features the same amount of male and female characters
Watch or rewatch an anime with a character that was featured on any AWC Challenge badge
Watch an anime that simultaneously satisfies a requirement from the Beginner’s Challenge and a requirement from the Intermediate Challenge
Watch an anime that has at least 5 Recent Activities within the last hour
Watch an anime that starts with the last letter of the anime you used for the requirement above
Watch an anime with five or more words in the title
Watch an anime with a Japanese honorific in the title
Watch an anime that another Advanced Challenger has given their maximum score
Watch an anime that more than 30,000 AniList users have completed
Watch an anime that another AniList user has completed more than once
Watch an anime from the favourites of the user above or below you in this thread
Watch or rewatch an anime based on some merchandise you own, a friend owns or that was shared by a member in the AWC Discord
